title: bowtie statistics
description: Compute summary statistics about a previous Bowtie report.

dialect.description: The JSON Schema dialect used for the Bowtie report.

last_ran_on.description: The timestamp when the Bowtie report was last generated.

median.description: The median of all implementations' compliance scores.

mean.description: The arithmetic mean of all implementations' compliance scores.

quantiles.description: The quartiles (25%, 50%, 75% breakpoints) of all implementations' compliance scores.
